ComicInfo.Summary:
“EXILED”
Malcolm Dragon and his family must come to grips with the reality that they may never go home again. A new home. A new life. 2017 Inkwell Award-winner Erik Larsen delivers another smash issue of SAVAGE DRAGON!
ComicInfo.Writer: Adam McGovern,Erik Larsen,Nathan Bulmer,Andrew Maxwell,Chris Giarrusso,Nathan Bulmer,Andrew Maxwell,Chris Giarrusso,Adam McGovern,Erik Larsen
ComicInfo.Title: Part 4; Mer-Made in America
